name: node-8-users-filter-sort
description: 1. init git , github 2. npm init -y 3. npm install express morgan dotenv cors mongodb 4. .gitignore failas jame node_modules .env itraukti 5. npm install eslint --save-dev 6. npm init @eslint/config 7. src/server.js - aprasyti express aplikacija 8. package.json - surasom scripts: start, lintFix 9. http.rest - routes 10. src/api/ - susikurti resurso faila pvz usersRoutes.js 11. src/api/usersRoutes.js - susikuriam router express.Router() iseksportuojam so module.exports default exportu
